qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the extent of the horizontal spatial coverage of TPD is not compliant with the DPS extent in km**2
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the extent of the horizontal spatial coverage of the selected input data is not compliant with the DPS extent in km**2

udFu.name: Horizontal spatial coverage fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the extent of the vertical spatial coverage of TPD is not compliant with the DPS extent in metres.
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the vertical coverage of the selected input data is not compliant with the DPS coverage extent in metres

udFu.name: Vertical spatial coverage fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the extent of the temporal coverage of TPD is not compliant with the DPS extent in days.
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the time coverage of the selected input data is compliant with the DPS coverage extent in days

udFu.name: Temporal coverage fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the extent of the number of items of TPD is not compliant with the DPS number of items in days.
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the number of items of the selected input data is compliant with the DPS number of items in days

udFu.name: Error count fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage of completeness/Incompleteness of the number of characteristcs with respect to the list in DPS

udFu.name: Thematic content fitness for use error

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the product averaged horizontal mesh size or horizontal scale is not compliant with the DPS averaged mesh size or horizontal scale
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the horizontal resolution or equivalent scale value (eg 50 m for map scale of 1/50 000) data or mean horizontal sampling interval of the selected input data is compliant not with the DPS horizontal resolution

udFu.name: Horizontal resolution fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the product averaged vertical mesh size or vertical scale is not compliant with the DPS averaged mesh size or vertical scale
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the vertical sampling interval of the selected input data is not compliant with the DPS vertical resolution

udFu.name: Vertical resolution fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the errors of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the product temporal sampling interval is not compliant with the one defined in DPS (percentage to be extracted from text of AP.3.3 measure)
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the temporal sampling interval is not compliant with the DPS temporal sampling interval

udFu.name: Temporal resolution fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the error of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Compliance with the value domain of the accuracy defined in DPS (% extracted from thematic accuracy description)
qm.udQe: Compliance of the value domain of the accuracy of the selected input data with the value domain of the accuracy defined in DPS (% extracted from thematic accuracy description)

udFu.name: Thematic accuracy fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination of the error of the product component Cn with the error of the selected input data set Ud Cn used for this component

qm.tdpQe: Percentage to which the elapsed time of the product is not compliant with the max elapsed time specified in DPS.
qm.udQe: Percentage to which the elapsed time between last selected input data record update is not compliant with the max elapsed time specified in DPS

udFu.name: Temporal validity fitness for use error

qm.udFu: Combination od errors of extent to which the elapsed time between last selected input data record update and the product creation date is compliant with the max elapsed time specified in DPS
